Package edu.Minesweeper

Class CellChange

java.lang.Object
edu.Minesweeper.CellChange
public class CellChange
extends java.lang.Object
calculates the neighbours from the cell that is targedted

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    CellChange()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void CellIsChange​(int col, int row, java.lang.String[][] output)
    loops around the targeted position and counts the mines if there are no mines, the function "isCellZero" gets loaded
    void ifCellIsZero​(int col, int row, java.lang.String[][] output)
    loops around the targeted Cell one more time, just to loop around each element to count the mines around them
    void loopIfCellIsZero​(int col, int row, java.lang.String[][] output)
    loops around the element in which the method "ifCellIsZero" is in and count the mines
    void printMessage​(java.lang.String[][] output)
    prints the playground for the next move

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • CellIsChange

      public void CellIsChange​(int col, int row, java.lang.String[][] output)
      loops around the targeted position and counts the mines if there are no mines, the function "isCellZero" gets loaded
      Parameters:
      col - takes the column from userInputEquals
      row - takes the row from userInputEquals
      output - takes the PlayGround as String[][]output

    • ifCellIsZero

      public void ifCellIsZero​(int col, int row, java.lang.String[][] output)
      loops around the targeted Cell one more time, just to loop around each element to count the mines around them
      Parameters:
      col - takes the column from userInputEquals
      row - takes the row from userInputEquals
      output - takes the PlayGround as String[][]output

    • loopIfCellIsZero

      public void loopIfCellIsZero​(int col, int row, java.lang.String[][] output)
      loops around the element in which the method "ifCellIsZero" is in and count the mines
      Parameters:
      col - takes the column from userInputEquals
      row - takes the row from userInputEquals
      output - takes the PlayGround as String[][]output
